title: [信息][PCD][Bungee]ABPS——保护你服务器的隐私内容[1.8-1.12]
author: Alorw
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Alorw 于 2017-9-16 09:45 编辑 
作者的话Welcome to my first BungeeCord plugin, with this plugins you will prevent players to see your plugins in the whole network. It's very easy to install and it's the first plugin that also blocks TAB in commands.
You can configure all the messages.这是我第一个BungeeCord插件, 该插件能让你的玩家在任何子服都无法使用一些服务端自带的命令以看到类似于插件列表的信息. 你不需要做任何过多的配置, 即可屏蔽大多数同类命令!
屏蔽的命令
（你可以在配置中增加更多）
/about
/bukkit:about
/bukkit:help
/bukkit:?
/bukkit:me
/bukkit;pl
/bukkit;plugins
/bukkit:ver
/bukkit:version
/help
/icanhasbukkit
/info
/?
/pl
/plugins
/ver
/version
/ + TAB
/ver + TAB
/a + TAB
/b + TA

等等......
效果图



权限（其实没多大用）

abps.bypass
拥有此权限将会绕过本贴列出的保护的命令的限制除了"TAB"命令. 这些命令所有人都将被禁止，因为他们很危险。

安装方法

首先下载插件
然后将插件本体拖放到BungeeCord插件文件夹中

重启完成，享受插件吧！

测试服务器

见原帖

服务条款

下载本插件代表你同意服务条款

1. You are not permitted to redistribute this plugin in any form, including as a part of a software package.2. You aren't permitted to decompile the plugin or modify it in any form.3. You agrre that if you have a problem to contact with me first (Via Discussion Page or PM) before leaving a review.4. I reserve the right to change this Terms of Service at any time, and you agre to abide by the most recent version of this.

请支持作者，从原帖下载！
